channel.title: What happened to Uniqueness?
channel.description: I have been browsing server advertisements, seeing if a actual half decent server was released. I come to this realization: Most of them are insidiax Leeches. Most are Matrix leeches. Its kind of sad. I do not mean to hate on any servers, but i believe there are hardly any unique servers left. Thoughts?

item.title: What happened to Uniqueness?
item.dc:creator: @xzorniax xzorniax
item.description:
@xzorniax wrote:

Im not to sure, but i do know that Nrs3 leeches are taking over again. :eek:

Read full topic

Oi! You forgot final judgement leeches

haha I remember those, wasn’t that a PI base though?

item.title: What happened to Uniqueness?
item.dc:creator: @xzorniax xzorniax
item.description:
@xzorniax wrote:

Pblord, ive seen your server, it is very unique, and well done. You took Delta, and made it into something unique. If everyone did that, the rsps community would be more interesting.

item.title: What happened to Uniqueness?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

tyb97:

Base doesn’t matter, its all about the programmer, and what he does with his base. I’ve seen people look down upon others servers just because they were using PI, when it doesn’t matter, you don’t know what he plans to do with it. If its clear he didn’t do anything, then that makes sense, but think before you post.

This.

On Topic: You should check out our Server Development thread.

Read full topic

item.title: What happened to Uniqueness?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

xzorniax:

Exactly… I have offered to help someone using Insidiax, and when i went to help them Add some content, they said they were switching to Matrix “I GONNA HOOST MATRIX CUZ OF NEW WEPS”, Its really annoying. Any server that actually is unique, never gets anyone. Hence, a good example, a Year ago, A 508 Was put out, Named junglescape. It was extremely unique. It had 2 sides players choose, the light and dark. Each side has a part of the map, and there were dungeons to explore. All the skills had a part for your team, and the two teams could attack each other… It never had anymore then 2 people on, and the content/coding was amazing.

When I was in the middle of programming my current server, someone randomly logged in, and left because there weren’t any items that were from 600+ revision

Read full topic

Base doesn’t matter, its all about the programmer, and what he does with his base. I’ve seen people look down upon others servers just because they were using PI, when it doesn’t matter, you don’t know what he plans to do with it. If its clear he didn’t do anything, then that makes sense, but think before you post.

Any server that actually is unique, never gets anyone. Hence, a good example, a Year ago, A 508 Was put out, Named junglescape. It was extremely unique. item.title: What happened to Uniqueness?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Years ago when people still used silabsoft as the main client, I downloaded all-star and actually made a lot of changes before I advertised it. I wanted to make a custom home and npcs and shops and all that truly easy stuff. It was a lot of fun for me to do at the time. People don’t even change anything now a days. They do as you said, download, change name, and host.

Read full topic

item.title: What happened to Uniqueness?
item.dc:creator: @xzorniax xzorniax
item.description:
@xzorniax wrote:

Oh, I assume itll be moved soon, but most of the servers who use them as bases change the message… And there advertisements have the same content. It justs annoys me with the repetition.

Read full topic

item.title: What happened to Uniqueness?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Should have gone in server discussion.

However, I do agree but i’ve used both as bases because they are good bases to start with. People have to start somewhere though…
